changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO users (name, email, id, username, date_created, status, date_activated, password, timezone, agreed_terms_version, agreed_terms_date, security_question, security_question_answer, security_question_correct, reality_check_enabled, client_verified) VALUES ('system', 'info@keevosh.com', X'41ecd948b0fb11e2b453001e3378d786', 'SYSTEM', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'password', 'Europe/Athens', '0.1', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'security_question', 'security_question_answer', 0, 0, 0)

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.sql: hash partition bets ALTER TABLE b_regular_match_bet PARTITION BY KEY(id) PARTITIONS 8;

hash partition bets ALTER TABLE b_fantasy_derby_bet PARTITION BY KEY(id) PARTITIONS 8;
hash partition bets ALTER TABLE b_challenge_bet PARTITION BY KEY(id) PARTITIONS 8;

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: add external id into match_games table

changeSet.author: ek0951
changeSet.sql: update team_member_scores s set s.match_status = (select m.status from match_games m where m.id = s.match_id); alter table fantasy_team_scores modify status ENUM('OPEN', 'INVALID', 'FINALIZED');

changeSet.author: ek0951
ek0951
changeSet.comment: create tables for persisting delayed messages in integration module

changeSet.author: ek0951
changeSet.comment: drop profile columns from user table

changeSet.author: ek0951
changeSet.comment: composite primary key for team member scores

changeSet.author: ek0951
changeSet.comment: Make scores nullable and distinguishable from zero
changeSet.sql: UPDATE fantasy_team_scores s SET s.score = null WHERE s.fantasy_team_id NOT IN (SELECT m.fantasy_team_id FROM fantasy_team_members m where s.fantasy_team_id = m.fantasy_team_id); UPDATE fantasy_league_members lm SET lm.points = null, lm.rank = null, lm.previous_rank = null WHERE lm.fantasy_team_id IN (SELECT s.fantasy_team_id FROM fantasy_team_scores s WHERE s.score IS NULL);

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.comment: Change column type for goals_conceeded goals scored

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.comment: add stats_update_locked column in match_games table

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.comment: Migrate and fill payment_details_id on p_payments for existing payments
changeSet.sql: update p_payments p set p.payment_details_id = (select id from user_card_details c where c.card_type = p.card_type and c.card_digits = p.card_digits and c.user_id = p.user_id)

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.comment: Remove not null constraints from opta_file_processing_log

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.comment: Move shirtId column from Team to SeasonMember
changeSet.sql: update season_members sm join teams t on t.id = sm.team_id set sm.shirt_id = t.shirt_id

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.sql: update b_placements p left join b_placement_historys h on h.bet_placement_id = p.id and h.status in ('WON','LOST','USER_CANCELED','CANCELED','REFUNDED','DELETED') set p.date_cleared = h.date_created

changeSet.author: ek0951
changeSet.comment: commissions by bet type on b_commissions (no data yet so no migration required)

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: add tracking id on users table

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: remove game scope from fantasy_teams, add is_system flag in fantasy_teams

changeSet.author: apsegian
apsegian
changeSet.sql: update leagues set coming_soon = 0 where external_id in (23, 8, 21); update leagues set coming_soon = 1 where external_id not in (23, 8, 21);

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.sql: update users set nickname = username;

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.sql: update user_wallets set currency = 'EUR';

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: add league_id and match_week_id on match_games

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: update league_id and match_week_id on match_games
changeSet.sql: update match_games mg join match_days md on md.id = mg.match_day_id join match_weeks mw on mw.id = md.match_week_id join seasons s on s.id = mw.season_id set mg.match_week_id = md.match_week_id, mg.league_id = s.league_id;

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: update is_system flag of system fantasy teams
changeSet.sql: update fantasy_teams set is_system = 1 where rteam_id is not null;

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: update users, name and timezone is nullable on creation

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.comment: Add column fee to table p_payments

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: add column b_placement_id to table bet_placement_invitations, remove constraint from user_id for table b_placements

changeSet.author: apsegian
changeSet.comment: remove constraint from user_id for table b_placement_historys

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.sql: update b_placements p join b_tournament_bet b on b.id = p.bet_details_id join b_tournament_conf c on c.id = b.bet_conf_id join b_pot_stats s on s.match_week_id = p.match_week_id and s.bet_conf_id = c.id join ( select unhex(replace(SUBSTRING_INDEX(description, ':', -1) , '-', '')) as bet_conf_id, unhex(trim(SUBSTRING_INDEX(replace(SUBSTRING_INDEX(description, ':', -2) , '-', ''), ':', 1))) as match_week_id , amount as topup from b_transactions where description like '%TOPUP%' ) aa on aa.bet_conf_id = b.bet_conf_id and aa.match_week_id = p.match_week_id join ( select p.match_week_id, b.bet_conf_id, sum(p.amount_won) as total_won from b_placements p join b_tournament_bet b on b.id = p.bet_details_id group by p.match_week_id, b.bet_conf_id ) bb on bb.bet_conf_id = b.bet_conf_id and bb.match_week_id = p.match_week_id and status = 'WON' set topup_amount = round((p.amount_won / bb.total_won ) * aa.topup, 2);

changeSet.author: tassos
changeSet.sql: update b_transactions set bet_conf_id = unhex(replace(SUBSTRING_INDEX(description, ':', -1) , '-', '')), match_week_id = unhex(trim(SUBSTRING_INDEX(replace(SUBSTRING_INDEX(description, ':', -2) , '-', ''), ':', 1))), subtype = 'TOPUP' where description like '%TOPUP%';
update b_transactions t join b_placements b on b.id = t.bet_placement_id join b_challenge_bet d on d.id = b.bet_details_id set t.match_week_id = b.match_week_id, t.bet_conf_id = d.bet_conf_id;
update b_transactions t join b_placements b on b.id = t.bet_placement_id join b_fantasy_derby_bet d on d.id = b.bet_details_id set t.match_week_id = b.match_week_id, t.bet_conf_id = d.bet_conf_id;
update b_transactions t join b_placements b on b.id = t.bet_placement_id join b_regular_match_bet d on d.id = b.bet_details_id set t.match_week_id = b.match_week_id, t.bet_conf_id = d.bet_conf_id;
update b_transactions t join b_placements b on b.id = t.bet_placement_id join b_tournament_bet d on d.id = b.bet_details_id set t.match_week_id = b.match_week_id, t.bet_conf_id = d.bet_conf_id;
update b_transactions t join b_placements b on b.id = t.bet_placement_id join b_mvp_bet d on d.id = b.bet_details_id set t.match_week_id = b.match_week_id, t.bet_conf_id = d.bet_conf_id;
